Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

KSTrajControlEnergy.cxx
1 #include "KSTrajControlEnergy.h"
2 #include "KSTrajectoriesMessage.h"

4 #include <limits>

6 namespace Kassiopeia
7 {
8 
9  KSTrajControlEnergy::KSTrajControlEnergy() :
10  fLowerLimit( 1.e-12 ), // energy
11  fUpperLimit( 1.e-10 ), // energy
12  fMinLength( std::numeric_limits< double >::min() ), // length
13  fMaxLength( std::numeric_limits< double >::max() ), // length
14  fInitialStep( 1e-10 ), // time
15  fAdjustmentFactorUp( 0.5 ), // factor
16  fAdjustmentFactorDown( 0.5 ), // factor
17  fStepRescale( 1. ), // factor
18  fTimeStep( 0. ), // time
19  fFirstStep( true ) // flag
20  {
21  }
22  KSTrajControlEnergy::KSTrajControlEnergy( const KSTrajControlEnergy& aCopy ) :
23  KSComponent(),
24  fLowerLimit( aCopy.fLowerLimit ),
25  fUpperLimit( aCopy.fUpperLimit ),
26  fMinLength( aCopy.fMinLength ),
27  fMaxLength( aCopy.fMaxLength ),
28  fInitialStep( aCopy.fInitialStep ),
29  fAdjustmentFactorUp( aCopy.fAdjustmentFactorUp ),
30  fAdjustmentFactorDown( aCopy.fAdjustmentFactorDown ),
31  fStepRescale( aCopy.fStepRescale ),
32  fTimeStep( aCopy.fTimeStep ),
33  fFirstStep( aCopy.fFirstStep )
34  {
35  }
36  KSTrajControlEnergy* KSTrajControlEnergy::Clone() const
37  {
38  return new KSTrajControlEnergy( *this );
39  }
40  KSTrajControlEnergy::~KSTrajControlEnergy()
41  {
42  }
43  void KSTrajControlEnergy::ActivateObject()
44  {
45  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy resetting, adjustment factor is <" << fAdjustmentFactorUp << "/" << fAdjustmentFactorDown << ">" << eom );
46  fFirstStep = true;
47  fTimeStep = 0.;
48  return;
49  }
50 
51  void KSTrajControlEnergy::Calculate( const KSTrajExactParticle& /*aParticle*/, double& aValue )
52  {
53  if ( (fFirstStep == true) || (fTimeStep == 0.) )
54  {
55  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy on first step" << eom );
56  fTimeStep = fInitialStep;
57  fFirstStep = false;
58  }
59  else
60  {
61  fTimeStep *= fStepRescale;
62  }
63 
64  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy suggesting <" << fTimeStep << ">" << eom );
65  aValue = fTimeStep;
66  return;
67  }
68  void KSTrajControlEnergy::Check( const KSTrajExactParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSTrajExactParticle& aFinalParticle, const KSTrajExactError&, bool& aFlag )
69  {
70  fTimeStep = aFinalParticle.GetTime() - anInitialParticle.GetTime();
71 
72  double tFinalEnergy = (aFinalParticle.GetKineticEnergy() + aFinalParticle.GetCharge() * aFinalParticle.GetElectricPotential());
73  double tInitialEnergy = (anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy() + anInitialParticle.GetCharge() * anInitialParticle.GetElectricPotential());
74  double tNormalization = tFinalEnergy + tInitialEnergy;
75  double tEnergyViolation = 2. * fabs( (tFinalEnergy / tNormalization) - (tInitialEnergy / tNormalization) ) ;
76 
77  if( tEnergyViolation< fLowerLimit )
78  {
79  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy increasing stepsize at violation <" << tEnergyViolation << ">" << eom) ;
80  fTimeStep = (1. + fAdjustmentFactorUp) * fTimeStep;
81  aFlag = false;
82  return;
83  }
84  if( tEnergyViolation > fUpperLimit )
85  {
86  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy decreasing stepsize at violation <" << tEnergyViolation << ">" << eom );
87  fTimeStep = (1. - fAdjustmentFactorDown) * fTimeStep;
88  aFlag = false;
89  return;
90  }
91 
92  double tStepLength = aFinalParticle.GetLength() - anInitialParticle.GetLength();
93  // particle's speed is calculated only when needed since GetVelocity() is a rather expensive operation
94 
95  if( tStepLength < fMinLength )
96  {
97  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy increasing stepsize at step length <" << tStepLength << ">" << eom) ;
98  fTimeStep = (1. + fAdjustmentFactorUp) * fMinLength / anInitialParticle.GetVelocity().Magnitude();
99  aFlag = false;
100  return;
101  }
102  if( tStepLength > fMaxLength )
103  {
104  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy decreasing stepsize at step length <" << tStepLength << ">" << eom) ;
105  fTimeStep = (1. - fAdjustmentFactorDown) * fMaxLength / anInitialParticle.GetVelocity().Magnitude();
106  aFlag = false;
107  return;
108  }
109 
110  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy keeping stepsize at violation <" << tEnergyViolation << ">" << eom) ;
111  return;
112  }
113

115  {
116  if ( (fFirstStep == true) || (fTimeStep == 0.) )
117  {
118  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy on first step" << eom );
119  fTimeStep = fInitialStep;
120  fFirstStep = false;
121  }
122  else
123  {
124  fTimeStep *= fStepRescale;
125  }
126 
127  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize energy suggesting <" << fTimeStep << ">" << eom );
128  aValue = fTimeStep;
129  return;
130  }
131  void KSTrajControlEnergy::Check( const KSTrajExactSpinParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSTrajExactSpinParticle& aFinalParticle, const KSTrajExactSpinError&, bool& aFlag )
